comments:
Build ID: M20071023-1652

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Install JDK 6u3
2. Start Eclipse
3. Uninstall and go back to JDK6u2


More information:
Today I installed the new JDK6u3 - after this Eclipse seems to take more time to start.
After starting I got "Illegal State Exceptions" and a lot of menus where not working any more.
For example after chossing the "update" menu entry nothing happens. Also the "refresh" entry in the right mouse context menu on projects has been vanished.

After deinstallung JDK6u3 and reinstalling JDK6u2 everything works fine again!

Following Exceptions from the error log:
